2.caption_en: Slide depicting "Amazon 2025" as a data-backed orchestrator centered on the consumer, coordinating all life areas (living, mobility, health, work, consumption, education, socialize, entertainment). It highlights roles such as an AI life manager, mobility and health/education orchestrator using massive databases, strong brand trust into the private sphere, and B2B data handling and analysis as key factors.
